  1. I was looking at The Trail by Franz Kafka and I've just discovered that the translation into English was by a legend of a Scottish lady called Willa Muir en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Willa_Muir - we were all taught Edwin Muir in school but nothing about her. #WomenInLiterature
